title: Khloe Kardashian's cheating ex Tristan Thompson flirts with star sparking reconciliation rumours
text:

Khloe Kardashian has sparked rumours she has taken her cheating ex Tristan Thompson back.

And NBA player Tristan, who cheated on Khloe twice, did nothing to dispel the rumours by being very flirtatious over Instagram .

Yummy mummy Khloe, 35, who has baby True with her ex, shared a sultry snap on the social network site and Tristan immediately liked the post.

The Cleveland player commented: "Fit", followed by two flaming emojis.

(Image: khloekardashian/Instagram)

(Image: khloekardashian/Instagram)

It isn't the first time Tristan has left sassy messages on his ex' Instagram feed.

In a now deleted comment on Khloe's Anna Nicole Smith snap, Tristan wrote: "Perfection," with a heart eye emoji.

(Image: realtristan13/Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

In the photo, Khloe sported elegant blonde waves and a 90s style outfit.

She transformed her image in the likeness of model and TV personality Smith.

(Image: Instagram)

The Kardashian nailed one of her early looks from a 90s Guess photo shoot as she donned a tight denim corset-style blouse.

Khloe has been accused of looking like a 'typical' KarJenner sister on Instagram, with her followers suggesting that she looks like a mock up of what the sisters would look like if they were blended together.

In the pic, Khloe's nose look slimmed down, despite her continued denials that she has never had cosmetic surgery there.

Her cheekbones appear to be missing in the pic and her skin is looking impossibly smooth.
description: Viewers of Keeping Up With The Kardashians will be familiar with Tristan's contact with his baby mama - but does this mean they are back together?
